channel.title: Brady Corbet on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Brady Corbet on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Amanda Seyfried on Going Feral to Play Shakers Founder Ann Lee: “I’ve Never Been Let Loose”
item.description: In the Venice Film Festival selection from Mona Fastvold, the actress stars as the founder of the Shakers, a radical religious sect that preached celibacy and got its name from wild worship practices.
